mapper.select: SELECT * FROM APPROVAL_FORM A JOIN APPROVAL_CAT B ON A.APPROVAL_CAT_CODE = B.APPROVAL_CAT_CODE
SELECT * FROM APPROVAL_FORM A JOIN APPROVAL_CAT B ON A.APPROVAL_CAT_CODE = B.APPROVAL_CAT_CODE WHERE A.APPROVAL_FORM_NO = #{ano}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES (SEQ_APPROVAL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{approvalTitle}, #{approvalContent}, SYSDATE, #{dueDate}, #{preservedYears}, #{approvalFormNo}, #{approvalMNo}, #{approvalFNo}, #{writerNo}, DEFAULT, #{TempSent})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE WRITER_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'N'

SELECT APPROVAL_NO, APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, WRITTEN_DATE, DUE_DATE, PRESERVED_YEARS, APPROVAL_FORM_NAME, APPROVER_M_NO, APPROVER_F_NO, WRITER_NO, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_FORM B ON A.APPROVAL_FORM_NO = B.APPROVAL_FORM_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.WRITER_NO = C.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE WRITER_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'N'

SELECT APPROVAL_NO, APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, WRITTEN_DATE, DUE_DATE, PRESERVED_YEARS, APPROVAL_FORM_NAME, APPROVER_M_NO, APPROVER_F_NO, WRITER_NO, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_FORM B ON A.APPROVAL_FORM_NO = B.APPROVAL_FORM_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.WRITER_NO = C.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE APPROVAL_NO = #{ano}
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, EMP_NAME AS REPLY_WRITER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, STATUS FROM APPROVAL_REPLY A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.REPLY_WRITER_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE REF_ANO=#{ano} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE APPROVER_M_NO = #{eno} OR APPROVER_F_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'N'

SELECT APPROVAL_NO, APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, WRITTEN_DATE, DUE_DATE, PRESERVED_YEARS, APPROVAL_FORM_NAME, APPROVER_M_NO, APPROVER_F_NO, WRITER_NO, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_FORM B ON A.APPROVAL_FORM_NO = B.APPROVAL_FORM_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.WRITER_NO = C.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE APPROVER_M_NO = #{eno} OR APPROVER_F_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE WRITER_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'Y'

SELECT APPROVAL_NO, APPROVAL_TITLE, APPROVAL_CONTENT, WRITTEN_DATE, DUE_DATE, PRESERVED_YEARS, APPROVAL_FORM_NAME, APPROVER_M_NO, APPROVER_F_NO, WRITER_NO, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_FORM B ON A.APPROVAL_FORM_NO = B.APPROVAL_FORM_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.WRITER_NO = C.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE WRITER_NO = #{eno} AND TEMP_SAVE = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE EMP_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.APPROVER_M_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.APPROVER_M_NO = #{mno}

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.APPROVER_F_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.APPROVER_F_NO = #{fno}

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.WRITER_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.WRITER_NO = #{wno}
